events.text: [color=#ffed29]("The results of the church's deliberations impact the production of [b]Remedium[/b] greatly, but do not affect the day-to-day of the clergy in the slightest.")
[color=#ffed29]("So why the church appears to be in greater effort to deliver this news, than the Avidine Factory is to receive it, is beyond me.")
[color=#ffed29](Yo, this church dude has no chill.)
[color=#ffed29](But I'm surprised the church had anything to do with [b]Remedium[/b] at all?)
[color=#ffed29](No one told me anything about the church being a part of this...)
[color=#ffed29]("The results of the church's deliberations impact the production of [b]Remedium[/b] greatly, but do not affect the day-to-day of the clergy in the slightest.")
[color=#ffed29]("So why the church appears to be in greater effort to deliver this news, than the Avidine Factory is to receive it, is beyond me.")
[color=#ffed29](Yo, this church dude has no chill.)
[color=#ffed29](This must be in reference to the church no longer being in charge of [b]Remedium's[/b] approval.)
